abstract: New York City Campaign Finance Board fines Manhattan lobbying firm Advance Group almost $26,000 for violating campaign finances rules when working on 2013 campaigns of New York City Council members Mark D Levine and Laurie A Cumbo.
lead_paragraph: The penalties add up to nearly $26,000 for The Advance Group, which sent direct mailings for an animal-rights group that also promoted two City Council candidates.

headline.main: Manhattan Lobbying Firm Fined for 2013 Campaign Violations

snippet: The penalties add up to nearly $26,000 for The Advance Group, which sent direct mailings for an animal-rights group that also promoted two City Council candidates.
